ygData.subject: Re: Alliance
ygData.msgSnippet: Blight: Why does it get the reward? Well simple, it will have passed the test, you would not have passed it. As for why you both die, you have such confidence

Blight: "Why does it get the reward? Well simple, it will have passed 
the test, you would not have passed it. As for why you both die, you 
have such confidence in this Predacon, that you must suffer the 
consequences at the end much like she will. When she fails. Now 
agree."

Blight grins evily as he waits for Darkfates answer, not many have 
passed the Bamphomets test, not ever did a cybertronian pass it.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> Darkfate::
> 
> "I'm not a gree in a point" replied Darkfate"If 'she' win,  she 
ONLY 
> get the reward, but if she fails BOTH die? why not I get the or 
both?"
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., Legendarynemasis@a... wrote:
> > BLight smirks as he knows exactly what test to give this "smart" 
> > Predacon.
> > 
> > Blight: "Very well I bet your smart predacon can't pass the test 
> the 
> > Bamphomet gives to all in order to evolve to the highest rank of 
> > Infecticon. The terms are, if he does, he is transformed into one 
> of 
> > the Bamphomets creations. If he does not... he and you die. 
> Alright?"
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> > > Darkfate::
> > > 
> > > "You choose the terms of the bet, with the condition if I'm not 
> > agree 
> > > with them I can say no" said the male "And the bet is that 
> > > Blacknightmare is smarter than whichever of you... We just have 
> to 
> > do 
> > > her a test"
> > > 
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., Legendarynemasis@a... wrote:
> > > > Blight: "Oh? A bet? What are the terms? and what is the bet?"
